TEMPLATE FEATURES

Qucikstart Package - Buy Now (only 16 USD)

Church Joomla! 3 Responsive Template, based on the Master Bootstrap Framework for Joomla! 3.x. The Bootstrap Framework makes it fully responsive to all screen resolutions and aspect ratios. The simplest way to build professional sites. Your imagination and your experience are the limit!

Church Joomla! 3 Responsive Template Features:

  • Joomla! 3.x compatible.
  • Based on Bootstrap 3.3.5. One framework, every device. Bootstrap easily and efficiently scales your Joomla websites with a single code base, from phones to tablets to desktops with CSS media queries.
  • Responsive Mobile-Friendly template for all Joomla 3.x. A responsive layout automatically adapts to the viewing device, allowing for an optimized appearance on multiple devices, such as tablets.
  • Template Bundle Package.
  • Left sticky menu, logo and widgets.
  • CSS Superfish multi-level dropdown menu.
  • Responsive multi-level menu support, flexible and cross-browser compatibility.
  • Tableless design and 100% CSS based.
  • Built by advance HTML5 and CSS3.
  • Lightweight and fast-loading.
  • Logo as Image with configuration parameters.
  • Built-in Google Fonts (more fonts - 650+ available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • Built-in social media icons for the popular social networking sites including Twitter, Facebook, Google Plus, Youtube, LinkedIn and more...
  • 2 layout options: 2 columns (content + right), 1 column (content).
  • Typography Page.
  • A lot Module Positions. All module positions are fully collapsible.
  • Cross-Browser Support - Church template work great with all modern browsers like Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera and Internet Explorer 9+.
  • Heading: h1, h2, h3, h4 and h5.
  • SEO SEF Optimised Layout. Optimized code for Search Engines which helps in SEO.
  • SEO Breadcrumbs with Microdata Google - this will give a nice category-display in the Google search results.
  • And more features, some only available in the Premium Version with quickstart package:

Church Joomla Template Quickstart Instalation Package

What is quickstart package?

"Quickstart Package" is a Church Joomla Template + Joomla 3 + all content, all modules, all components and settings used in demo site.

How to install Quickstart package?

Quickstart Package install exactly the same as a normal Joomla! installation package. (To get know more about technical requirements to run Joomla! please visit: Joomla technical requirements).

Quickstart will save your time and work. You will get exactly the same as demo page http://demo.joothemes.net/joomla3/church

Quickstart package extra features and modules:

  • Unite Revolution Slider - an awesome, fully responsive jQuery slider! (available only with Qucikstart Package)
  • Gallery plugin and module (available in Qucikstart Package). (Sigplus Image Gallery Plus is a straightforward way to add image or photo galleries to a Joomla article with a simple syntax. It takes a matter of minutes to set up a gallery but those who are looking for a powerful gallery solution will not be disappointed either: sigplus is suitable for both beginner and advanced users.
  • Joomla responsive grid module media portfolio for Joomla 3x.
  • Built-in 650+ Google Fonts (available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • Joomla news module display latest news (Joomla Articles or K2) with full control over all elements (available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • JCE editor - the best WYSiWYG editor for Joomla!
  • Extra SEO SEF plugins automatically generates description meta tags by pulling text from the content to help with SEO. It also gives you the ability to set different title configurations.
  • Extra Cache plugin.
  • And more...
